1.png.action: go up 0.5 meters — bad action - lost target
1.png.description: The green pot plant is partially visible on the right side of the image, on a shelf. Moving up will help center the plant in the frame and bring it closer.
The green pot plant is partially visible in the distance, slightly to the right. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.

2.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
2.png.description: The green pot plant is not visible in the current image. The view is obstructed by a large brown object, possibly a piece of furniture, and a wall.
